entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 25.

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
